description: Minor amendments to the window and door openings and fenestration pattern added ventilation louvres; new fire exit from Assembly Hall to Hornsey Lane; maintenance access path and steps introduced around Chapel Drum; introduction of guardrails to roof (sloping rails to Hornsey lane); stairs 1and 2 adjusted with curtain walling setting adjusted and ventilation louvres introduced; further recess of hand rail to dining hall roof with introduction of additional green roof; external doors omitted from Sports Hall; concealed gutter, facia and soffit board omitted from Walkways and Learning Terraces and replaced with grey polyester powder coated aluminium gutter and facia. Sloping canopy introduced; extent of roof plan green roof reduced; boiler room door omitted; line of canopy and balustrading on Level 0, SE of the New Entrance Block, moved; position and direction of bottom flight of Stair 3 amended; balustrades to External Walkway and Learning Terraces lowered from 1800mm to 1500mm; new retaining wall, bench, ramp and steps on the SW (Courtyard) side of Block C; Block C: Extent of new render to existing facade adjusted.  SW Elevation moved back 400mm; new Fire Exit from Dining Hall Roof into Block A with associated ramp and Level 2 Learning Terrace landscape strip omitted; Sports Hall, external fire escape ladder added to SE Elevation and fire Main Inlets added as set out in schedule of changes ref: reference 1 - 6, 8 - 10, 12 - 14, 16 - 24, 26 and 27 to planning permission P080111 dated 5 February 2008 (which varied full planning permission P071734, dated 30 November 2007) - not including any details of materials or roof plant.
decision_conditions: Please be advised that the reference to roof plant and facing material details provided under points 7, 11, 15, and 25 are required for consideration under condition 4 (materials) of P080111 and does not form part of this assessment.
